Primary Contact: Denise Dawson, Team Leader, Okanagan Service Delivery Area
Service Details: - Helps parents plan for the transitional years from adolescence to adulthood, as the services they receive will end upon their child's 19th birthday- Children and Youth with Special Needs (CYSN) worker will support the parents to plan for their child's future starting at age 16- CYSN worker may assist with referrals to adult CLBC services, adult health services, applying for Persons with Disabilities (PWD), or identifying what supports may be needed in the future for their child
